starter.title: Enter the name of the city and find out the weather

main-banner.title: Today's Highlights
main-banner.feel-text: How hot or cold it really feels
main-banner.cloudy-text: The sky fraction obscured by clouds

additional-banner-1.text-1: Longitude measures distance east or west of the prime meridian.
additional-banner-1.text-2: Latitude lines start at the equator (0 degrees latitude) and run east and west, parallel to the equator.

additional-banner-2.title: Humidity:
additional-banner-2.text-1: Humidity is the concentration of water vapor present in the air. Water vapor, the gaseous state of water, is generally invisible to the human eye.
additional-banner-2.text-2: The same amount of water vapor results in higher relative humidity in cool air than warm air.
